title: Charlie, The Mexican Devil
body:
Ok so everyone is doing the Charlie Charlie challenge why not make a Charlie champ?
(P) Charlie Charlie are you there?: for every kill on any creature Charlie gets a stack of yes or no (50-50) if Charlie gets a stat of yes he gets 0.5/0.75/0.9/0.95/1/1.5/2/2.5  ATTACK damage if Charlie gets a stack of no he gains (^) armour
(Q) Hellspawn: Charlie makes his target play the Charlie Charlie game, fearing them for 0.5/1/1.5/2/2.5 seconds and then doing 50/75/100/125/150 (+ 0.9 Ap) over time (Cd 7/6/5/4/3 seconds Mana: 30/40/50/60/70)
(W) Goodbye: Target player forgot to say goodbye and increases Charlie's ap by 10/20/30/40/50 ap for 10/15/20/25/30 seconds ( Cd 20/18/16/14/12 mana 100/125/150/175/200)
(E) Haunting Seconds: for 3/4/5/6/7  seconds Charlie  deals 30/40/50/60/70 (+1 ap) to all enimes around him ( 10/9/8/7/6 cd 20/19/18/17/16 mana)
(R) PenlikeMovements:  Charlie decimates his oppents slowing and silence IGN all enimes and gives Charlie 100% bonus movement speed  while multiplying his passive stacks by 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 for 5/10/15/20/30 seconds  (150/125/100 mana cd 1:50/1:25/1:00)
Stats
Health: 700 (+15)
Mana: 600 (+15)
Hps: 0.5 (+0.5)
MPs: 0.5 (+0.5)
Ad: 70(+5)
ap: 0(+0)
As: 0.95
Armour: 20(+0)
Magic resist: 20(+0)
Movement speed: 235 (+0)
